content: Hello, I need help fixing a leak in my kitchen sink.
Hello! I’m XYZ Home Services’ assistant. I’d be happy to help with your kitchen sink leak. May I know your name, please?
Oh, I think I called the wrong number, I’m sorry. This isn’t XYZ, is it?
No problem at all! It happens. This is XYZ Home Services, but if this isn’t the number you wanted, I won’t keep you. Have a great day!
